ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, everyone new to RPGing: Crow Lord has volonteered (because he has nothing better to do) to run a Beginners RPG for the Neo Beast Wars RPG. This RPG will

Hey, everyone new to RPGing:

Crow Lord has volonteered (because he has nothing better to do) to
run 
a
'Beginners RPG' for the Neo Beast Wars RPG. This RPG will cover most 
RPGing
stuff (battle, etc...), and will (hopefully) make people in it better 
at
RPGing. It'll also be a good opportunity for experienced RPGers to 
improve
their skills. I'm going to go ahead and list people who I think might 
want to
be in it (please don't take offence at this, it's just a list).

JOIN CAUSE SO FAR WE ONLY GOT 2 TO JOIN. WE NEED PEOPLE. JOIN IF YOU 
NEED PRACTICE.
